code: import _ from"lodash";import{message}from"antd";export const VerifyCreateAccount=function(email,password){if(_.isEmpty(email)){message.error("Email Missing");return false;}if(_.isEmpty(password)){message.error("Password Missing");return false;}return true;};export const checkTools=function(tools){if(_.isEmpty(tools)){message.error("Tool not to be Empty");return false;}return true;};
